title:
A friend told me that the recycling program in Wilmington is not really a true recycling program, that everything collected is in fact, burned. 

Is this true? If so, what is the point of calling it a recycling program?
text:
Here's a link to the answer to your question.



Although this answer was to another question submitted about the same
time, I think it answers your question, too:
http://www.myreporter.com/?p=7403
